hero.title: Never lose on price again
hero.subtitle: Monitor competitors. Track trends. Optimize your pricing.
hero.welcome_subtitle: Check your dashboard for the latest price insights

monitoring.title: Real-time monitoring
monitoring.description: Track competitors 24/7. Get instant alerts on price changes. AI-powered scraping works on any e-commerce site.

intelligence.title: Price intelligence
intelligence.description: Understand market trends. See historical price changes. Know exactly when to adjust prices for maximum profit.

alerts.title: Smart alerts
alerts.description: Get SMS alerts when competitors undercut you. Email notifications for price drops and opportunities. Never miss a pricing opportunity.

ai_scraping.title: AI-powered scraping
ai_scraping.description: Our intelligent scraper adapts to any website. No manual setup. Just add competitor URLs. Works even when websites change.

integration.title: Easy integration
integration.description: Import products via Channable feed. Add competitor URLs with one click. Self-service. No technical knowledge required.

insights.title: Actionable insights
insights.description: See which products are overpriced or underpriced. Identify opportunities to increase margins. Data-driven pricing decisions.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Scale as you grow.

starter.name: Starter
starter.features: 3 competitors||500 products||Channable feed sync||Email alerts||Basic analytics||Priority support

professional.name: Professional
professional.features: 5 competitors||2,500 products||Channable feed sync||SMS + Email alerts||Advanced analytics||Weekly reports||Priority support

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.features: Unlimited competitors||Unlimited products||API access||White-label option||Dedicated support||Custom reports||SLA guarantee

hero.title: Powerful features for smart pricing
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to stay competitive and maximize profits
